title: Gamer Tyler “Ninja” Blevins Has All-Day Phone Alarms
sub_head: The 30-year-old is the most-streamed professional gamer in the world—which is why a 10 percent battery really stresses him out. He shares what’s on his phone.
body:
Most-recent phone call
With my wife, Jess [Blevins], and it was only one minute.
